net.hudup.listener

Class BalancerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.data.PropList
      • net.hudup.core.data.DataConfig
        • net.hudup.core.data.SysConfig
          • net.hudup.core.client.ServerConfig
            • net.hudup.listener.ListenerConfig
              • net.hudup.listener.BalancerConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, TextParsable

    public class BalancerConfig
extends ListenerConfig
    This class represents the configuration of a balancer. It inherits from ListenerConfig because balancer inherits from listener.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • balancerConfig

        public static final java.lang.String balancerConfig
        Default file path default balancer configuration.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BALANCER_PORT_FIELD

        public static final java.lang.String BALANCER_PORT_FIELD
        Name of the entry that contains balancer default port. It is "balancer_port" by default.

      • BALANCER_TIMEOUT_FIELD

        public static final java.lang.String BALANCER_TIMEOUT_FIELD
        Name of the entry that contains balancer timeout. It is "balancer_timeout" by default. The balancer is available to serve incoming request in a interval called a timeout in miliseconds. After timeout interval is reached, the balancer suspends and users must resumes it. As usual, the value of such name is initialized by the constant Constants.DEFAULT_SERVER_TIMEOUT.

      • BALANCER_TASK_PERIOD_FIELD

        public static final java.lang.String BALANCER_TASK_PERIOD_FIELD
        Name of the ntry that contains task period of balancer. It is "balancer_task_period" by default. The period in miliseconds that the balancer does periodically internal tasks. As usual, the value of such name is initialized by the constant Constants.DEFAULT_LISTENER_TASK_PERIOD.

      • REMOTE_INFO_LIST

        public static final java.lang.String REMOTE_INFO_LIST
        Name of the entry that contains list of remote information. It is "remote_info_list" by default.

        port - specified port.

      • userEdit

        public java.io.Serializable userEdit(java.awt.Component comp,
                                     java.lang.String key,
                                     java.io.Serializable defaultValue)
        Description copied from class: PropList
        This method allows user to edit (modify, customize) value of the specified key. The defaultValue is initial value of such key. This method returns the value as a result that user modified the defaultValue. As usual, this method shows a graphic user interface (GUI) assist user to make modification. By default, this method of PropList does nothing, which returns null.
        Overrides:
        userEdit in class PropList
        Parameters:
        comp - Graphic user interface (GUI) component works as the parent component of the GUI assistant that helps user to make modification.
        key - Specified key.
        defaultValue - Initial value of the specified key.
        Returns:
        Customized value after user made modification.
